title: generalised q-deformed oscillators and their statistics
abstract: We consider a version of generalised $q$-oscillators and some of their applications. The generalisation includes also "quons" of infinite statistics and deformed oscillators of parastatistics. The statistical distributions for different $q$-oscillators are derived for their corresponding Fock space representations. The deformed Virasoro algebra and SU(2) algebra are also treated.
